data.text: Ɓalaame pɛtɛni ga nɛɛʋɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ ga tuyai loo Izilayɛle ʋɛ, é la mɔ ɠɛni liini kulakɛlɛma ɠili gaiziɛzu, eɠɛ pelegi é ɠɛni kɛɛzu la zɔɔma ziɛgiti su, kɛlɛ é ɠaazu latini teʋebai letema ʋelei.
É ɠaazuwuzeɠeni, é Izilayɛle ɠa ʋuuni, eɠɛʋelei ná-bolodaiti ti la. Názu ɠa GALA Zɛnvui yeini la tɔun ma.
Ɓalaame faalaalii nii laazeelini, é ɠɛ ma:
nui nii é GALA gooiti mɛnisu, naa ná-keela wooi ɠaa,
Ee Zakɔɓe, ɗa-zeɠe ɠotaiti wola ʋagɛ,
Ti ɗa yei ga zuviega eɠɛ laasamagiti,
Ziɛi ɠa yeizu, é ɗa ɠula seizuʋɛ,
GALA ge kulaʋɛ Ezipete yooi ʋa,
Toɠa ɓili, é ʋɛɛ eɠɛ zala zinɛi,
Ɓalake yiiɠaawanani Ɓalaame ma, é yealoɠani, é ɠɛni Ɓalaame ma: «Gè è loligɛ ga è ʋa, è sìli nuiti foovo, wɛlɛ, ná zeizu ɠɛa saʋa, è ɗa tuya loo ti ʋɛ.
Tɛi é ɠɛa ɠana, liina ɗa-yooi zu! Gè boni ga nà faanɛɛ mɔinmɔin kɛ è ʋɛ, kɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI è ʋalagɛ faanɛɛiti sɔlɔɔ fai ma.»
Ɓalaame Ɓalake wooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «Gè ɓɔɛni ɠani keelaiti pɔ, è ti leʋeni mà:

‹Anɛɛ ni Ɓalake ɠa ʋaazu ga walii ta zanugi, nii é ná-masa pɛlɛi laavegai, é fe zèa, gè la zooga faa nɔpɛ kɛɛzu ga ma ʋagɔ, ɓaa ma ɲɔu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-devei laalɔɠɔma. Nà naa nɔ wo, nii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI a bo mà.›
Niizu nà ga li nà-nuɓusɛiti pɔ. Ʋa, nà naa lɛɛzu ga ɗe, nii Izilayɛle nuɓusɛiti ti ʋaazu kɛɛzu ga ɗa-nuɓusɛiti, yeeɠɛɠalaiti su ti ʋaazu.»
Ɓalaame faalaalii nii laazeelini, é ɠɛ ma:
nui nii é GALA gooiti mɛnisu, naa ná-keela wooi ɠaa,
Nà pɛtɛsu, kɛlɛ niizu laade dɛ,
Toɠa Edɔme yooi zo, é ɠɛ ga nɔnɔ,
Nui nii é ɠulazu Zakɔɓe mavofodai zu, naa ɠa masadai ɠɛ,
Ɓalaame Amalɛke ɠaani. É faalaalii nii laazeelini, é ɠɛ ma:
É Ken nuiti kaani. É faalaalii nii laazeelini, é ɠɛ ma:
Kɛlɛ Ken nuiti ta ɠɛ ga abui laamianigi.
Gaaɓelasu, é faalaalii nii laazeelini, é ɠɛ ma:
Kɛlɛ keingiti ti ziɛi ɠa, ti ʋaazu, ti zeɠe Kitime,
Ɓalaame liini, é ɠale ma ná-zooi zu. Ɓalake ɓalaagi liini ga ʋɔ pelei.
